channel.title: About this forum
channel.description: I am going to use Smf for my new site but i have a few questions. I am going to have a site like moparscape here. What does moparscape use for a webhost? Do they just let www.smfforfree.com host it? And were do they get there domain?

item.title: About this forum
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Thanks guys

Sorry tahorok but eventually that feed error on my browser and stuff, but when i fix it ill be sure to check out your suggestion

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:17, topic:302797”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=399082.msg2961748#msg2961748 date=1253268435]
Okay thanks Rich, ill recomment if it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2009, 04:18:25 am[/size][hr]But a small tutorial would be nice please
Thanks
[/quote]You register with your domain click Manage Files(file manager?) upload SMF you downloaded from www.simplemachines.org and have fun.[/quote]

you gotta set up the MySQL database too, but that only takes about 30 seconds.

item.title: About this forum
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:15, topic:302797”]Okay thanks Rich, ill recomment if it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2009, 04:18:25 am[/size][hr]But a small tutorial would be nice please

Thanks[/quote]

Tutorial: Self taught people go far.

And from experience, 000webhost is shit. Their php execution time is set at 10 or 15 seconds, so good luck ever installing a mod.

The best free webhost I’ve really ever seen was nationvoice’s. http://webhosting.nationvoice.com. It’s just about impossible to get a confirmed registration on there anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: About this forum
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I rent a dedicated server (you don’t need one for a forum just starting out, shared hosting will be fine) and run SMF with lighttpd as a webserver and MySQL for a database.

Read full topic

item.title: About this forum

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I would use simplemachines and on most sites you can find that at the bottom of the site. You’ll need a webhost to upload it to though, the link to the download of simplemachines is on 'Arrons post

I am going to use Smf for my new site but i have a few questions. I am going to have a site like moparscape here. What does moparscape use for a webhost? Do they just let www.smfforfree.com host it? And were do they get there domain?

item.title: About this forum
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

We have a dedicated server, no we don’t use a smfforfree, Moparisthebest made a database, uploaded SMF, entered in the database information. Smfforfree is a scam, they make you a cheap SMF forum, make it so you cannot add mods, new themes from the Simplemachines website and put so many ads you can barely see.

You can download SMF at www.simplemachines.org/download

They also have tutorials on how to install SMF.

Read full topic
